text: Kodwa lowo uthi kubazali bakhe: “Uff4 kuni, nindithembisa ukuba ndiza kuphinda ndivuswe (ekufeni) lo gama izizukulwana ezingaphambili kunam sele zadlulayo?” Babe bona (abazali bakhe) bethandazela ukufumana uncedo kuAllâh (besithi kunyana lowo wabo): “Yeha kuwe!
